page.title: 14HINDU WEDDING IN WILLESDEN
page.content: When a Hindu wedding celebration is coming , Hindus get together and celebrate. On Sundays,{the bridegroom gets ready and{the bride}gets ready too. The bride wears a{red sari}with tinsel on it. Then the{holy man}comes in and brings{holy books}too. He gets a square pot and puts sticks and oil in it and he lights the sticks to make the fire. Then we have a meal and then the bride goes to her husband's house. The bride and her sisters put{mendi}on their hands, it is an orange colour.
